phrases: Hey all you viewers out there!
When you are watching Fairy Tail keep the room nice and bright,
and sit back from the screen, all right?
Let us go on an S class quest, Lucy!
And that is how we were forced by Lucy to come to the cursed island, Galuna!
You are the ones who invited me!
And there were dogs, and eyebrows, and sideburns and a giant frozen monster!
Yes, it is Deliora all right.
So it was transported from the Northern Continent to here?
Maybe the island's curse has to do with this demon?
This demon is still alive, after all.
All we's got to do is bust up this demon!
Is force your only solution to every problem?
That is not really that uncommon.
Do not get near it, you Fire Wizard!
If that ice melts, and it is freed, no one would be able to stop it!
Would that ice really melt all that easily?
Hey, I am the one who got punched!
My master, Ul, encased the demon using an Iced She Will spell.
That is ice that cannot melt.
No matter what kind of magical fire you use, you could not melt that ice.
If they knew they could not melt it, then why move it here?
I do not know, but maybe they are trying to melt it somehow?
Who brought Deliora here, and for what reason?
We should just chase after those guys from before.
We wait until the moon comes out.
I would be bored to death!
Gray, what are you talking about?
I think that this island's curse and Deliora are both connected somehow with the moon.
And those guys also said, Soon we will have collected enough moonlight.
I am curious about what will happen and what they are up to.
This guy really just lives on instinct, you know?
I am almost kind of jealous.
Gate of the Harp, I open thee!
Why do not you call me more often?
I want to be lots and lots more helpful to you!
Lucy, you are such a meanie!
But I can only call you three days a month!
So, what kind of song would you like me to sing today?
I would like a song about fish!
Then I will play whatever comes to mind!
Lyra is very good at singing.
Mira is also a good singer.
She sings me songs about fish, too.
The words living on inside of you...
Time seems to stand still, changes into courage...
You will become stronger than you were.
Believe in those words back then.
It is true that Lyra has the power to sing songs that reflect what is in people's hearts.
Then tell me that before hand.
Now that I think about it, what if someone comes along?
It is light from the moon!
We will search for where the light is coming from!
A magic circle is spread over the center of the ruin!
They are really collecting the light from the moon.
What are they trying to do by shining it on Deliora?
It is a spell in Belianese... Moon Drip!
They are using Moon Drip to resurrect that demon!
Iced She Will is ice that cannot be melted!
The magic that can melt it is the Moon Drip.
The collected magic of the moon has the power to undo any magic.
These guys do not know the horror of Deliora!
I think the curse that the people believe is on this island is a side-effect of the Moon Drip.
The collected magic from the moon is contaminating their bodies.
That is just how powerful a magic it is.
Damn it, I am all sleepy after waking up at noon.
And we never did find the intruders.
There seemed to be intruders around noon, but we failed to catch them.
I cannot express my love like this.
He is even wearing a funky mask.
At this rate, either today or tomorrow...
As for the intruders, I will brook no interference.
The only other people here should be the villagers on the far side of the island.
But the people in the village had nothing to do with it!
I would rather avoid bloodshed, however...
I cannot stand sneakin' around anymore!
Well I guess we have to do this now, do not we?
So the people from the village requested a guild save them.
Anyone who interferes or plots against me is my enemy.
I will stop this crazy ritual of yours!
Do you have any idea what you are doing?
How long has it been, Gray?
What is the meaning of this?
I cannot believe you were the wizard the villagers called here.
Or is this just a coincidence?
I can handle things here myself.
You think we will let you go so easily?!
He got encased by magic that freezes air!
At this rate we will be turned to ice next!
But, what will happen to Natsu?
If we are all done in, who will protect the village?!
It took a lot of effort to keep yourself from helping Natsu, did not it?
I am sure Natsu'll be fine!
You think ice'd work against the Salamander?
So you bought enough time for the woman and cat to get away?
Sherry and the rest should have no problems against them.
Do not underestimate Fairy Tail wizards, you!
You could magically explode that ice ball whenever you felt like it.
So you made sure he is out of my magical power's range?
Enough with the elder-student act already, Lyon.
You are no longer Ul's pupil!
Since Ul's no longer of this world.
She gave her life to seal away Deliora!
You are the one trying to destroy her legacy!
You are the one who killed Ul!
And yet you lived on, unashamed, Gray.
What is with this ice, though?
I cannot melt it with fire...
I do not have time for this!
I have got to get to the village!
It is hard to run like this!
Why do you want to go to that island?
The rumors say that humans turn into demons!
I am going to punish some rule breakers.
Uh, can I join you too?
You are the one who killed Ul.
How dare you even speak her name!
Then do not get in my way.
Let us have a match, just like old times.
Your specialty is creating inanimate objects.
Did you forget about ice that can move?
You still use both hands when you use creation magic?
That is what Ul taught us, remember?
If you use one hand to create, it will be incomplete and off-balance!
I have long since surpassed Ul's ability!
Do not get a big head!
I wonder if you will be able to land even a single hit on me.
Do not think I am the same as I used to be!
I could use creation magic with one hand, and you could not.
We may have traveled different paths,
but both of us are frozen as we were at that time.
That is why I will melt the ice!
In order to walk the path that was sealed!
But you stole that dream from me.
I thought I would never have the chance to surpass Ul again.
If I could do what even Ul could not: defeat Deliora...
You should know all too well the horror of Deliora!
Stop, it is impossible, you say?
That is exactly what we said to you back then...
It is because you challenged Deliora that Ul's dead!
You have no right to speak Ul's name!
It is Professor Happy's Fairy Tail Lecture!
Today we will be telling you the secrets of Natsu, a Fire Wizard!
Natsu was raised by a dragon named Igneel.
He uses a rare kind of magic called Dragon Slayer where he eats and punches with fire!
I wonder what it ate to get that big?
Fish has got lots of calcium in it, so it is got to be fish!
I would rather eat meat than fish.
Next time: Natsu vs. Yuka The Wave!
But you would get arrested real quick if you got any bigger.
It would be too easy for you to destroy towns.
